titles: The progresse of divine providence, set out in a sermon preached in the Abbey Church of Westminster before the house of Peers, on the 24th of September, 1645. being the day of their monethly fast. / By William Gouge, one of the members of the Assembly.
author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.
publisher: Printed by G.M. for Ioshua Kirton next Goldsmiths-hall in Foster-lane,
notes: Order to print on verso of first leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
